item.title: Need some help with safe zones
item.dc:creator: @kniveslives kniveslives
item.description:
@kniveslives wrote:

Okay, I have this, I’m trying to make a safe zone;

public boolean inwildy = false;
public boolean inwildy2 = false;
public void checkwildy()
{
if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3672))
{
inwildy = true;
}
else
{
inwildy = true;
}
}
public void checkwildy2()
{
if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3514))
{
inwildy2 = true;
}
else
{
inwildy2 = true;
}
}

I’m trying to add;

if ((absX >= 3656 && absX <= 3666 && absY >= 3488 && absY <= 3506))

I got that much from syrillia’s tutorial or whatever, everytime I add it, there’s no effect at all on the area. Yes I did Compile, before someone asks.

Read full topic
item.source: Need some help with safe zones
